Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for registering for the Verizon Employee Only Pivotal Cloud Foundry Bootcamp on {{lead.PCF Session Date:default=edit me}}. Your registration is confirmed. See event details below.
Time: 8:00am - 4:30pm Location: 5055 N Point Parkway, Alpharetta, GA 30022 Room: September 22 Room 2218N - (Caribbean), September 23 Room 2203E - (Colorado Springs)
Pre-requisite work is required for all registered attendees and can be completed here <http://oneconfluence.verizon.com/pages/viewpage.action?title=Prereqs+for+Bootcamp&spaceKey=~V611391>.
Should you have any questions or would like more information, please email gkortye@pivotal.io <mailto:gkortye@pivotal.io> or arshad.aziz@verizon.com <mailto:arshad.aziz@verizon.com>.
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team
